verses.text: And \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* unto \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*; for he had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that they had \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* him \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in the room of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: for \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* was \w ever|strong="H3117"\w* a \w lover|strong="H0157"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.\f + \fr 5.1 \ft Hiram: also called, Huram\f*
And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* how that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* unto the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* the \w wars|strong="H4421"\w* which were about him on every \w side|strong="H5437"\w*, until the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them under the \w soles|strong="H3709"\w* of his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

But now the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath given me \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*, \add so that there is\add* neither \w adversary|strong="H7854"\w* nor \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w occurrent|strong="H6294"\w*.

And, behold, I \w purpose|strong="H0559"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* unto the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, whom I will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* upon thy \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* in thy room, he shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* unto my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.  +  r 5.5  t purpose: Heb. say *

Now therefore \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thou that they \w hew|strong="H3772"\w* me cedar \w trees|strong="H0730"\w* out of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*; and my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* shall be with thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: and unto thee will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w hire|strong="H7939"\w* for thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* according to all that thou shalt \w appoint|strong="H0559"\w*: for thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* that \add there is\add* not among us \w any|strong="H0376"\w* that can \w skill|strong="H3045"\w* to \w hew|strong="H3772"\w* \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* like unto the \w Sidonians|strong="H6722"\w*.\f + \fr 5.6 \ft appoint: Heb. say\f*

¶ And it came to pass, when \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, that he \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, which hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* a \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* over this \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w considered|strong="H8085"\w* the things which thou \w sentest|strong="H7971"\w* to me for: \add and\add* I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all thy \w desire|strong="H2656"\w* concerning \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* of \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*, and concerning \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* of \w fir|strong="H1265"\w*.\f + \fr 5.8 \ft considered: Heb. heard\f*

My \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* shall bring \add them\add* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* unto the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: and I will \w convey|strong="H7760"\w* them by \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* in \w floats|strong="H1702"\w* unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* that thou shalt \w appoint|strong="H7971"\w* me, and will cause them to be \w discharged|strong="H5310"\w* there, and thou shalt \w receive|strong="H5375"\w* \add them:\add* and thou shalt \w accomplish|strong="H6213"\w* my \w desire|strong="H2656"\w*, in \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* for my \w household|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 5.9 \ft appoint: Heb. send\f*

So \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* and \w fir|strong="H1265"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \add according to\add* all his \w desire|strong="H2656"\w*.

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w measures|strong="H3734"\w* of \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \add for\add* \w food|strong="H4361"\w* to his \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w measures|strong="H3734"\w* of \w pure|strong="H3795"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*: thus \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* to \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* by \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.\f + \fr 5.11 \ft measures: Heb. cors\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, as he \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* him: and there was \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* between \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* and \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*; and they \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w league|strong="H1285"\w* \w together|strong="H8147"\w*.

¶ And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w raised|strong="H5927"\w* a \w levy|strong="H4522"\w* out of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and the \w levy|strong="H4522"\w* was \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 5.13 \ft levy: Heb. tribute of men\f*

And he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* them to \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* by \w courses|strong="H2487"\w*: a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* they were in \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, \add and\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w* at \w home|strong="H1004"\w*: and \w Adoniram|strong="H0141"\w* \add was\add* over the \w levy|strong="H4522"\w*.

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* \w burdens|strong="H5449"\w*, and \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w hewers|strong="H2672"\w* in the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*;

Beside the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w officers|strong="H5324"\w* which \add were\add* over the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, which \w ruled|strong="H7287"\w* over the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, and they \w brought|strong="H5265"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \w costly|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \add and\add* \w hewed|strong="H1496"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, to lay the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w builders|strong="H1129"\w* and \w Hiram’s|strong="H2438"\w* \w builders|strong="H1129"\w* did \w hew|strong="H6458"\w* \add them\add*, and the \w stonesquarers|strong="H1382"\w*: so they \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* and \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 5.18 \ft stonesquarers: or, Giblites\f*
